00014 #ifndef LOCALEUTILITY_H
00015 #define LOCALEUTILITY_H
00016 
00017 //decide whether to use c++ locales or GNU extension c-style locales.
00018 //the c++ locales are standard, but not suuported on gcc < 3.
00019 //the gnu extension locales are not standard, but have have some
00020 //functionality that c++ locales don't have, such as strncmp.
00021 #if defined (__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ > 2
00022 //may already be defined in cpp file. 
00023 # ifndef USE_CPP_LOCALES
00024 #  define USE_CPP_LOCALES
00025 # endif
00026 #else
00027 # undef  USE_CPP_LOCALES
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #ifdef USE_CPP_LOCALES
00031 # include <locale>
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 // Includes
00035 #include "config.h"
00036 #include "MC2String.h"
00037 #include "LangTypes.h"
00038 
00044 class LocaleStringRef {
00045 public:

00057

00063 
00069    LocaleStringRef( const MC2String* str );
00070 
00072 
00073    const char* begin() const;
00074 
00076    const char* end() const;
00077 
00078 private:
00080    const char* const m_str;
00081 
00090    const char* const m_end;
00091 };

00211 class LocaleCompareLess {
00212 public:
00213    explicit LocaleCompareLess( LangTypes::language_t language ):
00214       m_locale( language ) {
00215    }
00216 
00217    LocaleCompareLess( const LocaleCompareLess& other ):
00218       m_locale( other.m_locale ) {
00219       
00220    }
00221 
00222    bool operator() ( const LocaleStringRef& lhs, 
00223                      const LocaleStringRef& rhs ) const {
00224       return m_locale.collate( lhs, rhs );
00225    }
00226    
00227 private:
00228    // we can not assign
00229    const LocaleCompareLess& operator = ( const LocaleCompareLess& );
00230    const LocaleUtility m_locale;
00231 };

00233 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods -
00235 
00236 
00237 inline bool 
00238 LocaleUtility::collate( const LocaleStringRef& lhs, 
00239                         const LocaleStringRef& rhs) const
00240 {
00241    return ( this->strcmp( lhs, rhs ) < 0 );
00242 }
00243 
00244 inline bool 
00245 LocaleUtility::operator()( const LocaleStringRef& lhs, 
00246                            const LocaleStringRef& rhs ) const
00247 {
00248    return this->collate( lhs, rhs );
00249 }
00250 
00251 inline 
00252 LocaleStringRef::LocaleStringRef( const char* str ) 
00253       : m_str( str ? str : "" ), m_end( m_str + strlen(m_str) )
00254 {
00255 }
00256 
00257 inline 
00258 LocaleStringRef::LocaleStringRef( const MC2String& str )
00259       : m_str( str.c_str() ), m_end( m_str + str.length() )
00260 {
00261 }
00262 
00263 inline 
00264 LocaleStringRef::LocaleStringRef( const MC2String* str ) 
00265       : m_str( str ? str->c_str() : "" ), 
00266         m_end( m_str + (str ? str->length() : 0) )
00267 {
00268 }
00269 
00270 inline const char*
00271 LocaleStringRef::begin() const {
00272    return m_str;
00273 }
00274 
00275 inline const char*
00276 LocaleStringRef::end() const {
00277    return m_end;
00278 }
